OrgName.entry: PLACES FOR PEOPLE - SUPPORT FOR REFUGEES

Desc.entry: Provides comfortable, safe and secure housing for refugees in 14 well furnished flats and houses. Also provides advice on claiming benefits, tenancy support and information on health care, training, education, employment and leisure. Can also provide floating support for 6 other tenancies (any type). A registered charity. Self or any referral.
